descr: My name is Miloš Stojanovski, I was born on the 11th of March 1998. in Pančevo. I finished the 3rd Grammar School in Belgrade and now I am studying at the ICT College, Belgrade. In addition, I work full time as a backend developer at ExamRoom.AI. I am creative, hard working, and always eager to learn emerging technologies and further advance in IT area of expertise.
